SettingButton.Help: You can change the game settings.

TileButton.Alt: Tile with X coordinate {{x}} and Y coordinate {{y}}

BoardPanel.Help:
The first to complete a line vertically, horizontally, or diagonally wins.

The display turn for a tile once taken is 5 turns.

Pay attention to the display turn and complete the line before your opponent.

LogPanel.Help:
System chats such as the number of victories will be displayed.

The log will be reset when the game is reset.
LogPanel.Title: Match History
